EmailTemplate.name: ProSeries- Cold Call
EmailTemplate.subject: The ProSeries Advantage: Learn more today
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.Name},
More than 65,000 tax pros trust ProSeries. If you’ll give me just two minutes of your time, I’d love to discuss your current tax software. We’re interested to hear about what works for you and what doesn’t. And I’d like to share some features in Intuit ProSeries that I think will benefit your firm by making returns faster to process.
Once I better understand your situation and your specific needs, I’ll be able to address questions I’m sure you have like...
What was the availability and response time of your technical support team last tax season? Do you have data conversion for my current software and if so, what can be converted? Do you have a solution that fits my budget? Tutorials and live webinars that will help you make the most of your evaluation period are just a click away. And you can always contact me to get you headed in the right direction.
I look forward to speaking with you soon. Let me know if there’s a time that works best for you.
Regards, {!User.Name} ProSeries Tax Consultant {!User.Phone} {!User.Email}
IMPORTANT: Intuit respects the personal nature of email communication. Every effort is made to offer only information that may be of value to you or your business. If you do not wish to receive marketing email from Intuit in the future, please click here.
If you have any questions or comments, please DO NOT REPLY to this email. Contact Customer Service at 800.765.7777 for assistance. If you receive an email message that appears to come from Intuit but that you suspect is a phishing email, please forward it immediately to spoof@intuit.com. Please visit http://security.intuit.com for additional security information.

All other marks are the property of their respective owners, should be treated as such, and may be registered in various jurisdictions.
Intuit Inc., Customer Communications, 2800 E. Commerce Center Place, Tucson, AZ 85706
